headline: Skyworks Qorvo Deal Reshapes Radio Chip Scale And Valuation Story
summary: Skyworks Solutions has announced a cash and stock proposal to acquire rival Qorvo, targeting a combined radio chip company valued at about $22b. The deal would bring together two major radio frequency suppliers to wireless and communications customers, with potential implications for competition and supply chains. For investors watching NasdaqGS:SWKS, this move comes after a challenging stretch for the stock. The shares most recently closed at $55.76, with a 1 year return showing a 34.5%...

headline: Reassessing Skyworks Solutions (SWKS) Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: Event context for Skyworks Solutions (SWKS) Skyworks Solutions (SWKS) has come back into focus for investors after a period of weaker share price performance, with the stock recently closing at $55.76 and showing negative returns over the past year and past 3 months.
